site_name: Flat F, 26-27 Queen's Gate Gardens, LONDON, SW7 5RP
description: Retrospective consent for removal of pre-existing cornicing and decorative ceiling features, removal of pre-existing skirting, removal of pre-existing doors and architraves, installation of new flooring and sound insulation to floors, new fireplace surround to the living room (larger front room), removal of door and architrave to the 2nd bedroom (smaller front room), removal of suspended ceilings and spot lights. Proposed works including the rearrangement of the rear of the flat, with a new bathroom and kitchen and installation of a single jib door between front room and rear room, provision of a new shower room within the half landing between the second and third floor. ***WITHDRAWN***
